app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Crystaliq Prism Photo Editor
app_description: Let the world enjoy your authentic perspective! Add crystal filters to your photos and videos to create a prismatic effect Give your photos a dreamy mysterious look Finetune your photos and videos with artistic color presets Turn photos into distinctive animations Rediscover your art and the world around you with the unique prism effect of Crystaliq. Explore and share different perspectives on the multi dimensional reality we live in. With Crystaliq effects you can create static or animated photos and videos that look mysterious magical and almost hypnotic. Just like watching the world through a glass prism or crystal. Share your art directly on Instagram VSCO Snapchat and TikTok. The tools you get to explore your authentic worldview: 14 CRYSTAL FILTERS Finetune prism filter to perfectly fit your photo and video Blur the edges of a crystalized pattern Add chromatic aberration Create a more dynamic realistic way to animate the photo with parallax effect 30 COLOR PRESETS Find ideal color correction that matches your taste. From clear cyan tones to thick magentas wherever your inspiration leads you. BLOOM Create a dreamy and foggy vintage look imitating a greasy camera effect. ANIMATION Add motion to your photo by simply moving your finger over an image. You ll achieve cool trippy patterns for animations of up to 30 seconds. VIDEO EDITOR Apply crystal filters to your videos and enjoy the mesmerizing kaleidoscope lens effect. There is no right or wrong way to use the Crystaliq app there is only your way! Let the world enjoy your authentic perspective! Tag crystaliq to get featured __ Have a question We re here to help support crystaliq.me.
